level.description: The language proficiency level or range of levels for the text (e.g., A1, A2, B1-B2, C1-C2).

items.description: An array of sentences with their translations.

origin.description: A single sentence from the text.

translation.description: Translation for sentence from the text.

title.description: The title of the text and its translations.

origin.description: The title of the text in the default language.

translation.description: The translation of the title in the specified language.

words.description: An array of words from the text with translations.

translation.description: The translation of the word in the specified language.

questions.description: An array of questions related to the text for comprehension testing.

options.description: Array of possible answers for the question.

id.description: Unique identifier for the answer option.

answer.description: The text of the answer option.

correct.description: Array of IDs representing the correct answer(s).

items.description: Tag or keyword for search text.
